thread.title: Watch: See how fast Liverpool's Daryl Nixon can run 84 yards to the end zone
thread.title_full: Watch: See how fast Liverpool's Daryl Nixon can run 84 yards to the end zone

author: Donnie Webb | dwebb@syracuse.com
title: Watch: See how fast Liverpool's Daryl Nixon can run 84 yards to the end zone
text:
View/Post Comments 
It was a play Liverpool put in during the week to help compensate for the loss of injured tailback Jaydakis Scott . 
As soon as quarterback Jordan Caviness surveyed the Cicero-North Syracuse defense, he knew it was going to be big. 
Daryl Nixon lined up in the backfield, went in motion and headed to the perimeter. Caviness sent a swing pass to Nixon, who picked up two blocks and then ran 84 yards down the sideline for a touchdown in Liverpool's 29-12 victory over the Northstars in a Class AA Section III playoff game on Friday. 
You can watch the play in the above video. 
The touchdown came in the second quarter right after Cicero-North Syracuse had been stopped on fourth-and-goal when Joe Scro intercepted a pass at the goal line. 
>> Class AA Section III tournament bracket 
With Nixon's score - and a surprise two-point conversion out of a fake - the Warriors moved out to a 15-0 lead. 
"Me and Jordan, we knew we had to connect, to get another touchdown and get the team going," Nixon said. "It was a designed for me so he just put it out there. We got two great blocks and the rest was ... 
"When I saw I had the two blocks, everything else was wide open. Great blocks." 
"We kind of game-planned the whole week to get our athletes the ball and let them be athletes in space," Caviness said. "That's what we tried to do with Daryl - get him the ball quick, get him disguised but get him the ball so he could go make plays. That's what happened." 
The two would connect for another touchdown play of 16 yards on a screen pass in the second half. 
Liverpool (7-1) moves on to play Baldwinsville (6-2) on Friday in a sectional semifinal game at Cicero-North Syracuse.
